channel.title: [Help] God wars bosses are glitched [PI]
channel.description:
General Graardor is glitched up, his head is like popping out and what not.
Zamorak boss works fine if i spawn him but if i put his animations in he dissapears on client re run. I'm using 602 animations.
Does anyone know how I could fix this? Thanks guys.
